" #CustomerRef and CustomerReq -Introduce an extension to handle Customer Reference (CustomerRef) and Customer Requisition (PurchaseOrder). -Implement logic to return the customer's name if either the customer reference or customer requisition is empty on free text invoices or sales orders.
(CustomerRef): IF(CustInvoiceJour.CustomerRef="", CustInvoiceJour.'$CustTable'.'name()', CustInvoiceJour.CustomerRef)
(PurchaseOrder) IF(CustInvoiceJour.PurchaseOrder="", CustInvoiceJour.'$CustTable'.'name()', CustInvoiceJour.PurchaseOrder)
"

ERExpressionStringConstant.Value:
#CustomerRef and CustomerReq -Introduce an extension to handle Customer Reference (CustomerRef) and Customer Requisition (PurchaseOrder). -Implement logic to return the customer's name if either the customer reference or customer requisition is empty on free text invoices or sales orders.
(CustomerRef): IF(CustInvoiceJour.CustomerRef=", CustInvoiceJour.'$CustTable'.'name()', CustInvoiceJour.CustomerRef)
(PurchaseOrder) IF(CustInvoiceJour.PurchaseOrder=", CustInvoiceJour.'$CustTable'.'name()', CustInvoiceJour.PurchaseOrder)

ERModelExpressionItem.ExpressionAsString:
" #CustomerRef and CustomerReq -Introduce an extension to handle Customer Reference (CustomerRef) and Customer Requisition (PurchaseOrder). -Implement logic to return the customer's name if either the customer reference or customer requisition is empty on free text invoices or sales orders.

(PurchaseOrder) IF(CustInvoiceJour.PurchaseOrder="", CustInvoiceJour.'$CustTable'.'name()', CustInvoiceJour.PurchaseOrder)
"

ERModelExpressionItem.ExpressionAsString:
" #CustomerRef and CustomerReq -Add an extension to Customer reference(CustomerRef) and Customer requisition (PurchaseOrder). There is following sequence on finding customer reference and requisition and if it cannot be found, it will use invoice account name. 1-Project Invoice proposal 2-Project contract > funding source
"

ERExpressionStringConstant.Value: #CustomerRef and CustomerReq -Add an extension to Customer reference(CustomerRef) and Customer requisition (PurchaseOrder). There is following sequence on finding customer reference and requisition and if it cannot be found, it will use invoice account name. 1-Project Invoice proposal 2-Project contract > funding source

There is following sequence on finding customer reference and requisition and if it cannot be found, it will use invoice account name. 1-Project Invoice proposal 2-Project contract > funding source
"
